text:
Sorry, Producer...
...I thought I'd ask about Sakuya's condition, but...
I might have messed up a bit.

No, it's not like that...!
And you asked Sakuya for me...!? Thank you...!
Well, you know... Just in case, just in case.

"It's okay" or "I'm fine" ...Those are words that
come out when something's wrong, right?

......That's the thing! I tried to approach
it with the intention of finding out~

I think I might have failed pretty spectacularly...
...and might have even made them more wary.
So... is this a report and an apology?

Thanks for the report. You don't need to apologize,
nothing happened to warrant an apology.

Really? ...I hope this doesn't strain things
because of Mitsumine's slip-up.

If it's the result of actions done sincerely with the other person
in mind, then I think it's just a matter of untangling them.
...That might be an area of weakness.
